StudentObject.description: Display information used to describe an instance of an object. This 'optional' information is for outbound descriptive purposes only and is not processed on inbound Workday Web Services requests.

StudentObjectID.description: The unique identifier type. Each "ID" for an instance of an object contains a type and a value. A single instance of an object can have multiple "ID" but only a single "ID" per "type".  Some "types" require a reference to a parent instance.

StudentObject.description: Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.

Academic_UnitObject.description: Display information used to describe an instance of an object. This 'optional' information is for outbound descriptive purposes only and is not processed on inbound Workday Web Services requests.

Academic_UnitObjectID.description: The unique identifier type. Each "ID" for an instance of an object contains a type and a value. A single instance of an object can have multiple "ID" but only a single "ID" per "type".  Some "types" require a reference to a parent instance.

Academic_UnitObject.description: Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.

FERPA_Preferences_Data.description: Institutional Academic Unit for FERPA Preferences.
Include students in Public Student Directory
Don't include students in Public Student Directory and mark them as private

validation.validation: Please submit a valid institutional academic unit for this student.
Student has no FERPA Preference for this Institutional Academic Unit.
You must either select Include in Public Student Directory or Do Not Include in Public Student Directory, but not both.
The specified student has been merged with another student record. Specify the merged student instead.
